description.text: Your dealings with pirates, thieves, and assassins have taught you to be exceedingly careful.

sections.Benefit: Opponents do not gain a +2 bonus on attack rolls for flanking you, although they can still sneak attack you. You also gain a +3 bonus on Sense Motive checks made to resist a foe's Bluff checks to feint in combat.
sections.Note: Note If using the optional Stamina Pool rules, the following trick may be used with this feat.
